CONJUGATES: handwritings (plural noun) | handwrite (base verb) | handwritten (past participle/adj)

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The distinctive style, script, or form of writing peculiar to a particular person.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 某人特有的书写风格、笔迹或字体。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: His careful, looping handwriting was instantly recognizable.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他那认真、带圈的笔迹立刻就被认出来了。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Text or characters produced by writing manually with a pen or pencil, as opposed to typing or printing.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用钢笔或铅笔等手动书写产生的文字或字符（区别于打字或印刷）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please submit your answers in clear handwriting, not typed.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请用清晰的手写体提交你的答案，不要打印。

REGISTER: Neutral and common in all registers.
